format:
A data frame with 38 observations on the following 10 variables which are
attributes for carboxylic acids:
title: Toxicity of Carboxylic Acids Data
description:
Description
The aim of the experiment was to predict the toxicity of carboxylic acids on
the basis of several molecular descriptors.

parameters.Ecarb: Electrotopological state of the carboxylic group
parameters.toxicity:
aquatic toxicity, defined as
\log(IGC_{50}^{-1}); typically the “response”.
parameters.ELUMO:
Energy of the lowest
unoccupied molecular orbital
parameters.Emet: Electrotopological state of the methyl group
